description:
Ash`s Farfetch`d was caught in Wyndon in the Galar region after Ash Ketchum was told by a trainer that a strong guy had defeated its Chewtle. Goh initially tried to catch it but it hit the Poké Ball away and it defeated Goh_Farfetchd in a battle. Ash`s Riolu battled it and defeated it and they took the Farfetch`d to be healed at the nearby Pokémon Center. At the end of the day as they were leaving the Pokémon Center, Ash Ketchum realized the Farfetch`d liked to battle and he asked it to join him which it did. Ash`s Farfetch`d is a Galarian Farfetch`d.
-- Battle vs Bea`s Hawlucha at the Fighting Dojo in Saffron City --
Bea`s Hawlucha battled against Ash`s Farfetch`d at the Fighting Dojo in Saffron City as part of Pokémon World Coronation Series Great Class battle. It overpowered Ash`s Farfetch`d with its lightning-fast moves.
Ash`s Sirfetch`d is the evolved form of Ash`s Farfetch`d. It evolved during the rematch battle against Rinto`s Gallade.
name: Kamonegi (Satoshi)
